main event: On March 31, 1954, an unidentified flying object shaped like a balloon was observed at Fairchild Air Force Base, Washington for approximately 6 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed visually with a total observation duration of 1 hour and 30 minutes., The object emitted no sound., The sighting concluded that it was possibly a balloon or aircraft., Witnesses believed they could estimate the object was over 60,000 feet away., There is no photograph available with the report.
sighted object: unidentified flying object shaped like a balloon
witness description: U.S. Air Force personnel including a general
